Game Development

Personal Projects

Several game development projects for fun. I find this to be a multidisciplinary learning experience - In addition to programming, game development involves software design, 2D art/3D modeling and graphics/rendering pipelines.

BULDING 3008 GITHUB

BUILDING 3008

A game developed in a week for Brackeys' Game Jam 2024 with our team of three. A fast-paced top-down shooter with fun progression mechanics. This was my first game jam, and the time restriction pushed us to delegate, develop, and test quickly while avoiding scope creep.

Aeronaut

A game developed in a week for Brackeys' Game Jam 2024 with our team of three. A fast-paced top-down shooter with fun progression mechanics. This was my first game jam, and the time restriction pushed us to delegate, develop, and test quickly while avoiding scope creep.
